/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The road itself is divided by a red fence, adding a pop of color to the scene. On the left side of the road, there are trees and bushes, their green hues contrasting with the red fence. On the right side, buildings rise, their facades hinting at the architectural style of the area. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting light and shadows that add depth to the image.
